description: Copywriting is a very specialized form of writing that requires certain skills, primarily that you are able to engage a reader, cause them to think about specific situations and motivate them into taking action based on providing them with a solution to an existing problem. Copywriting is used to inform, sell, distribute, market and promote products or services that are designed purposefully to entice individuals or other businesses to buy. Learn the art of copywriting and how to place words, choose words, express tone (the voice of your copy) and use emotional call outs to enhance your piece. Download a new way to make a living today!
